Question: In 1984, Jackie (Battley) this person told The Washington Post that the divorce was a "complete surprise" to her.
Hints: In March 1989, this person became House Minority Whip in a close election against Edward Rell Madigan.
Eighty-four ethics charges were filed against this person during his term as Speaker.
In 1981, this person co-founded the Military Reform Caucus (MRC) and the Congressional Aviation and Space Caucus.
